item.title: Who are we – digested as a software engineer
item.description:
I’m a software engineer and I tend to think like one. I see patterns, I view large real-world problems like a complex software system, and I make sense of things using tools I work with every day.

There’s one problem that keeps bothering me though: consciousness. Despite all we have learned, it is still unclear why our experience feels continuous. Why I go to sleep, wake up the next day and it is still me.

item.title: Example Tale
item.description:
Once upon a time, in a world not so different from our own, there lived a curious soul who discovered the magic of storytelling.

This was a simple example tale to show you how your Hugo site works. You can write stories of any length here—from short flash fiction to longer narratives.

To create a new tale, simply run:

hugo new tales/your-tale-name.md

Then start writing your story in the file that’s created. Your tales will automatically appear on the home page, ready to be shared with the world.
